meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7871.

td.p: Bridget Sullivan, a telemetry technician from Butte, Montana
Dylan Hamilton, a pediatric dentist from Durham, North Carolina
J Cheema, a marketing and strategy consultant from Portland, Oregon (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,000)

tr.td: PREDICTIONS BY 2030
TV TITLE CHARACTERS
WHICH STATE?
CRAFTS & HOBBIES
RECENT NONFICTION
THE GERMAN UMLAUT
